title: Rust Raw Identifiers Introduction
description: In this lab, we will learn about raw identifiers in Rust, which allow us to use keywords as identifiers in situations where they are typically not allowed, such as variable or function names, especially when older editions of Rust clash with newer keywords.

meta.title: Rust Raw Identifiers: Unlocking Keyword Usage in Your Code
meta.description: Explore the power of Rust's raw identifiers and learn how to use keywords as variable and function names, even in older Rust editions.
meta.keywords: keywords, rust playground, raw identifiers, coding, rust online compiler, rust tutor, rust commands, rust practice, rust online playground, rust online
